Movie & Dining: Complimentary 1-year EazyDiner Membership. 25% off on dining bills (up to ₹800) twice per month for transactions above ₹2,000.
Rewards Rate: 15 EDGE Points for every Rs. 100 spent on merchants like BigBasket, Tata 1mg, Zomato, etc, 15 EDGE Points for every Rs. 100 spent on International transactions, and 5 EDGE Points per Rs. 100 spent on all other spends.
Reward Redemption: EDGE REWARDS Points are redeemable at the Axis EDGE REWARDS portal where 1 Edge Reward = Re. 0.20. EDGE Points can also be transferred to partner Airlines/Hotels Rewards Program.
Domestic Lounge Access: 8 complimentary domestic airport lounge visits every year.
International Lounge Access: Priority Pass Membership With 6 Complimentary International Airport Lounge Visits Each Year

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: The Annual fee of Rs. 5,000 is waived on spending Rs. 7 Lakh or more in the previous year.
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on fuel transactions between Rs. 400 and Rs. 5,000 (caped at Rs. 500 in a month).
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the amount withdrawn or flat Rs. 500.

product_details: 30,000 EDGE Reward Points as a welcome benefit.
Up to 15 EDGE Reward Points for every spend of ₹100.
Complimentary access to International as well as Domestic Airport Lounges.
Up to 25% off on Dining bills with Axis Dining Delights.
